description: Commands to manage Storages in Azure Spring Cloud.

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage add
commands.summary: Create a new storage in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage add --storage-type StorageAccount --account-name MyAccountName --account-key MyAccountKey  -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService -n MyStorageName

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage list
commands.summary: List all existing storages in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage list -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage list-persistent-storage
commands.summary: List all the persistent storages related to an existing storage in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage list-persistent-storage -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService -n MyStorageName

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage remove
commands.summary: Remove an existing storage in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage remove -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService -n MyStorageName

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage show
commands.summary: Get an existing storage in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage show -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService -n MyStorageName

commands.name: az spring-cloud storage update
commands.summary: Update an existing storage in the Azure Spring Cloud.
examples: az spring-cloud storage update --storage-type StorageAccount --account-name MyAccountName --account-key MyAccountKey  -g MyResourceGroup -s MyService -n MyStorageName
